titles.title: To permit States to prohibit the disposal of solid waste imported from other nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 1/19/1999--Introduced. Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to allow any State to prohibit disposal in the State of any foreign solid waste. Exempts from such a prohibition foreign solid waste received pursuant to an existing host community agreement that specifically authorizes such receipt by a facility owner or operator that complies with all of the agreement's terms and conditions and has provided a copy of the agreement to the State and made it available for local public inspection.
